desc: Tired of pills and not sure what supplements you should be taking? There's a smarter way to stay healthy... Shevolve Nutrition M Bites are a delicious vitamin pill alternative. Each easy-to-take bite delivers the essential vitamins, minerals and fiber your body needs in menopause and healthy aging.

layout.text: Tired of pills and not sure what supplements you should be taking? There's a smarter way to stay healthy... Shevolve Nutrition M Bites are a delicious vitamin pill alternative. Each easy-to-take bite delivers the essential vitamins, minerals and fiber your body needs in menopause and healthy aging.
I really liked the light sweetness flavor. I also loved the texture
and how well the bar paired with coffee.
